comments: Dr. Frank Padilla is the most interesting professor I have ever had. He was very helpful in making sure people understood his lesson.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
stu_tags: HILARIOUS  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  LOTS OF HOMEWORK
comments: Very fun teacher! Easy class and easier homework and tests. If you want to be an elementary teacher get in his class, (its like repeating the 3rd grade)

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Canceled the final and last assignment. Some classes were interesting but he seemed tired and kind of checked out during class. Very easy A but didn\'t get a lot out of the class.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Very easy class. There are about five assignments, a few quickwrites (responses to movies watched in class), and a few journal entries. No tests and attendance is taken every class. He was incredibly knowledgeable and had lots of stories. He enjoys hearing about your experiences as well. Very nice guy! I recommend him!

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Padilla is the most unprepared and boring professor I have ever had. Attendance is mandatory and he treats the students like they are elementary school age, making us sign in after break. That being said, he is an extremely easy grader, almost everyone gets an A. Be prepared to spend 3 hours a week learning what NOT to do to inspire your students.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: he was a good professor, but very scattered. he would come to class 5-10 minutes late. Most of the time we watched movies, and wrote responses. Easy A, speak up in class and you\'ll do fine.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: A very easy teacher and he likes to hear about stories/tell stories. He is an easy A. His class makes you think about what you want to gain from becoming a teacher and lets you know if you still want to teach, inspiring class. A little on the boring side for some lectures.

tag_professor: Hilarious (1)  Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Respected (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Very easy class!! Dr. Padilla didn\'t require a text book. Be sure to set up your host classroom before school starts so you can get started right away. Very helpful, wants to see his students succeed. Highly recommended.
